title: Enhancing Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Agile Project-Based Framework for Adopting and Institutionalizing Educational Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational systems and professional field (medical/legal/technical) practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Design three strategies to apply the agile framework (sprint/backlog/retrospective) to the educational resource adoption process
Analyze at least five advantages and disadvantages of a distributed educational resource management model compared to traditional centralized systems

Learners analyze the current status of educational systems in real companies (e.g., manufacturing, IT services) through PBL (Problem-Based Learning) projects, establish an actionable roadmap (6-month intervals) with at least three improvement plans, and create presentation materials meeting at least four of five internal evaluation criteria (feasibility, viability, effectiveness)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
